title: Sample Book, "Decor Photowalls", 1975
provenance: 2012, given to the Cooper-Hewitt by Ed Goldman, who acquired at auction in 1990 from the Herbert Rose store display firm.
description: 26 photomural designs of nature, in color and black and white.

tombstone.epitaph: Sample Book, "Decor Photowalls", 1975.Photomurals. Gift of Ed Goldman. 2013-7-1-1/26.
